channel.title: iPod on KK's Blog (fromkk)
channel.description: Recent content in iPod on KK's Blog (fromkk)

item.title: iPod Video Review
item.description: I bought a iPod Video 5.5th Gen 80G recently. It’s only 200 Yuan (about $30) and I’m satisfied with it. Rockbox #The original firmware supports few audio format, it even can’t play FLAC. I install rockbox on it, which support FLAC and other format and I can transfer music without using iTunes or Finder.
